item.description:
hello,
I am sorry for that email that went out about meeting on Sunday, it is an automatic email from the old organizer that I have not been able to fully delete.

I would really like to meet the last Wed of every month at 7:30pm. This will help us be more regular with meeting and people can look forward to it. I am also open to meeting other times and special events. So I would like to invite you to our first regular meet up this month on the 27th of December.

The topic/mediation will be on attaining peace and stillness inside and outside.

See you all there...
In light,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Meditation Meet up Dec 27th ( Last Wed of every month)
